original_text: The first ripe fruits of all that is in their land, which they bring to the Lord, shall be yours. Everyone who is clean in your house may eat it.
korean_text: 그들이 여호와께 드리는 그 땅의 처음 익은 모든 열매는 네 것이니 네 집에서 정결한 자마다 먹을 것이라

sentences.original_text: The first ripe fruits of all that is in their land
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 땅에 있는 모든 것의 첫 익은 열매는

sentences.original_text: which they bring to the Lord
Everyone who is clean in your house
